query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.

query.result: 1 Wosa ow yn le unn le mayth uskensa'n bomm 2 a'n dowr a veu ow tos yn-mes an gylgh ter, 3 kepar ha'n bomm a wra gans an arnyow,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
4 quando tre ombre insieme si partiro, 5 correndo, d’una torma che passava 6 sotto la pioggia de l’aspro martiro.

query.result: 4 pan wosa teyr ombros ow tos owth yn-mes 5 ow resek, a-dhyworth unn dorf a veu ow pos 6 a-woles an gwlaw a'n boes marter.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
7 Venian ver’ noi, e ciascuna gridava: 8 «Sòstati tu ch’a l’abito ne sembri 9 esser alcun di nostra terra prava».
query.error: **English:** 7 They came towards us, and each one cried out: 8 "Stop, you who seem by your clothing 9 to be one of our evil land."
query.result: 7 Yth ethon dhe'n agan kyns, ha pub onan a leveris: 8 "Stêdh, ty ow synsi dhyworth dha dhillad 9 bos unn a'gan tir drog."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.

query.result: 10 Ah, py dhe'n welas wonnansow yn aga esel, 11 nowydh ha koth, gans an tanow trehesys! 12 Nebesaf vy dhe'n kovsaf pan vynnaf aga kovhevel.

Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.

query.result: 16 Ha na vijhe an tan a wrapp dhe'n le, 17 naturel an le, me a leveraf 18 bos dhe'th dhe'gas gwell ages dhe'th dhe'y."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.

query.result: 19 Yth eyl dhaskyrgh, pan safasow nyn, aga 20 hen gerens; ha pan vynnasow dhe'n agan, 21 y gwreson aga honen aga hwegh.
